But <S%G1161><s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> he <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> even to them that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> name: <S%G3686><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> were <S%G1080>born,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>Word<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4637>dwelt<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G2532>(and<s%> we <S%G2300>beheld<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of the only <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,)<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G225>truth.<s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> bare <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> he of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2036>spake,<s%> He that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> is <S%G1096>preferred<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G3450>me:<s%> for <S%G3754>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4413>before<s%> <S%G3450>me.<s%>

No <S%G3762>man<s%> hath <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> at any <S%G4455>time;<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> only <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> which <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2859>bosom<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> hath <S%G1834>declared<s%> him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> they unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> thou? <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G1325>give<s%> an <S%G612>answer<s%> to them that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G2248>us.<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3004>sayest<s%> thou <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G4572>thyself?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2065>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G907>baptizest<s%> thou <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1488>be<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> that <S%G4396>prophet?<s%>

And <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3756>not:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should be made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> am <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5204>water.<s%>
